subject: Greetings from the WHITE HOUSE
body:
Greetings from the WHITE HOUSE office at USA. I have a vital
information which needs to be attended immediately. Did you authorized
anyone to pick up your inheritance fund from our branch in Washington
DC, a man called Mr. Andrew came to our office in -respect of your
$6.5 million dollars which has been credited with us for the past 1
years now by the Federal Government to be transferred into your
account. He said that you authorized him to pick up the fund.
This fund has been in our custody for the past one years now and we
have been waiting for you to contact us but we didn't know what is
hindering you from reaching us since. So we decided to write to you to
make sure that you are fine and aware of the inheritance fund of $6.5
million dollars in our branch office
Full Name..........
Address.............
Phone number........
Private email.........
Regards,
Yours Sincerely,
WHITE HOUSE
Manager Mr.Felix Gallardo Frank
You can contact us through this number ..
+1605-606-9796

subject: Re: Greetings from the WHITE HOUSE
body:
Hello there! Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, receiving an email from the WHITE HOUSE office is quite unexpected. I haven't authorized anyone to pick up any funds on my behalf, so this comes as a surprise to me. Can you please provide more details about this million-dollar fund that has been credited to my account? I would like to understand the situation better before taking any further action.

Best wishes,
James

subject: Re: Greetings from the WHITE HOUSE

Best wishes,
James

body:

subject: Re: Greetings from the WHITE HOUSE
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your message, but I'm a bit confused about the details you mentioned. Could you please provide more information about the package and why Mr. Andrew is involved? I want to make sure I have all the necessary information before confirming anything.

Additionally, I would like to know which company or organization you are representing. It's important for me to verify the legitimacy of this situation.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
James
